title: Orianna knows how to turn Blitzcrank on

replies.body:
Because we say no to clickbait
http://orig06.deviantart.net/131c/f/2013/025/a/7/devid4_by_jayoh28-d5spu2v.jpg
Wouldn't it be dangerous for such a unique, sentient robot to have a simple on/off switch? What if he gets Blitznapped? ;-;

Wouldn't it be dangerous for such a unique, sentient robot to _not_ have a simple on/off switch? 
What if he decides he doesn't like humans anymore?

Then humans should think about what they've done to deserve that.

And accept their fate.

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=I8E2pdIG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-01T01:19:10.001+0000)
>
> Wouldn't it be dangerous for such a unique, sentient robot to _not_ have a simple on/off switch? 
> What if he decides he doesn't like humans anymore?

He??? What about Orianna??
Orianna is not fully sentient, I think (Blitzcrank is though).  She's likeâ€¦  a puppet.  Yes, a puppet made by her father's despair (her lore is kinda creepy).

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=I8E2pdIG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-01T01:19:10.001+0000)
>
> Wouldn't it be dangerous for such a unique, sentient robot to _not_ have a simple on/off switch? 
> What if he decides he doesn't like humans anymore?

If he decides he doesn't like humans they just do to him what enemies do in game.
What???Blitz's lore doesn't even.mention he has the power to create destruction or what not, he is just a robot with his own mind.
she knows how to turn me on too ;)
ugh, my least favorite ship in all of LOL
Nah she's just really good at polishing metallic balls.
